    • 构造器详细资料

      • DeviceRestrictionManager

        public DeviceRestrictionManager()

    • 方法详细资料

      • forceEnableWifi

        public boolean forceEnableWifi(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                               boolean open)
        Support from EMUI5.1B200 Called by an application that is administering the device to force enabled Wifi on the device, for this user. After setting this, no applications running as this user will be able to close Wifi on the device.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        open - Whether or not the Wifi should be enabled.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_WIFI} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • isForceEnableWifi

        public boolean isForceEnableWifi(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        Support from EMUI5.1B200 Determine whether or not the device's Wifi has been endble for this user, either by the current admin, if specified, or all admins.
        参数:
        admin - The name of the admin component to check, or null to check if any admins have enabled the Wifi.
        返回:
        true if Wifi has been force enabled, otherwise not force enabled.

      • forceEnableBluetooth

        public boolean forceEnableBluetooth(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                    boolean open)
        Support from EMUI5.1B200 Called by an application that is administering the device to force enabled Bluetooth on the device, for this user. After setting this, no applications running as this user will be able to close Bluetooth on the device.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated Bluetooth.
        open - Whether or not the Bluetooth should be enabled.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_BLUETOOTH} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • isForceEnableBluetooth

        public boolean isForceEnableBluetooth(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        Support from EMUI5.1B200 Determine whether or not the device's Bluetooth has been enabled for this user, either by the current admin, if specified, or all admins.
        参数:
        admin - The name of the admin component to check, or null to check if any admins have enabled the Bluetooth.
        返回:
        true if Bluetooth has been force enabled, otherwise not force enabled.

      • setWifiDisabled

        public void setWifiDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                            boolean disabled)
        Called by an application that is administering the device to disable Wifi on the device, for this user. After setting this, no applications running as this user will be able to access Wifi on the device.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        disabled - Whether or not the Wifi should be disabled.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_WIFI} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • isWifiDisabled

        public boolean isWifiDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        Determine whether or not the device's Wifi has been disabled for this user, either by the current admin, if specified, or all admins.
        参数:
        admin - The name of the admin component to check, or null to check if any admins have disabled the Wifi.
        返回:
        true if Wifi has been disabled, otherwise enabled.

        public void setBluetoothDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                 boolean disabled)
        Called by an application that is administering the device to disable Bluetooth on the device, for this user. After setting this, no applications running as this user will be able to access Bluetooth on the device.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        disabled - Whether or not the Bluetooth should be disabled.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_BLUETOOTH} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • setWifiApDisabled

        public void setWifiApDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                              boolean disabled)
        Called by an application that is administering the device to disable Wifi-Ap on the device, for this user. After setting this, no applications running as this user will be able to access Wifi-Ap on the device.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        disabled - Whether or not the Wifi-Ap should be disabled.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_WIFI} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • isWifiApDisabled

        public boolean isWifiApDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        Determine whether or not the device's Wifi-Ap has been disabled for this user, either by the current admin, if specified, or all admins.
        参数:
        admin - The name of the admin component to check, or null to check if any admins have disabled the Wifi-Ap.
        返回:
        true if Wifi-Ap has been disabled, otherwise enabled.

      • setUSBDataDisabled

        public void setUSBDataDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                               boolean disabled)
        Called by an application that is administering the device to disable USB on the device, for this user. After setting this, no applications running as this user will be able to access USB on the device.

        Note: if set disable, USB debug will turn off, if set enable, USB debug needs to be turned on manually.

        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        disabled - Whether or not the USB should be disabled.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_USB} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • isUSBDataDisabled

        public boolean isUSBDataDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        Determine whether or not the device's USB has been disabled for this user, either by the current admin, if specified, or all admins.
        参数:
        admin - The name of the admin component to check, or null to check if any admins have disabled the USB.
        返回:
        true if USB has been disabled, otherwise enabled.

      • setExternalStorageDisabled

        public void setExternalStorageDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                       boolean disabled)
        Called by an application that is administering the device to disable(unmount) SD card on the device, for this user. After setting this, no applications running as this user will be able to access SD card on the device.

        Note: if set enable, SD card will not be mounted if there is one, it needs to be mounted manually.

        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        disabled - Whether or not the SD card should be disabled(unmounted).
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_SDCARD} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if set disable when the default location is SD card.

      • isExternalStorageDisabled

        public boolean isExternalStorageDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        Determine whether or not the device's SD card has been disabled(unmounted) for this user, either by the current admin, if specified, or all admins.
        参数:
        admin - The name of the admin component to check, or null to check if any admins have disabled(unmounted) the SD card.
        返回:
        true if SD card has been disabled(unmounted), otherwise enabled(mounted).

      • setNFCDisabled

        public void setNFCDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                           boolean disabled)
        Called by an application that is administering the device to disable NFC on the device, for this user. After setting this, no applications running as this user will be able to access NFC on the device.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        disabled - Whether or not the NFC should be disabled.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_NFC} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • setVoiceDisabled

        public void setVoiceDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                             boolean disabled)
        Called by an application that is administering the device to disable telephone call on the device, for this user. After setting this, no applications running as this user will be able to make or accept telephone calls on the device.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        disabled - Whether or not the telephone call should be disabled.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_PHONE} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • isVoiceDisabled

        public boolean isVoiceDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        Determine whether or not the device's telephone call has been disabled for this user, either by the current admin, if specified, or all admins.
        参数:
        admin - The name of the admin component to check, or null to check if any admins have disabled the telephone call.
        返回:
        true if telephone call has been disabled, otherwise enabled.

      • setSMSDisabled

        public void setSMSDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                           boolean disabled)
        Called by an application that is administering the device to disable SMS and MMS on the device, for this user. After setting this, no applications running as this user will be able to send or receive SMS or MMS on the device.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        disabled - Whether or not the SMS and MMS should be disabled.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_MMS} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • isSMSDisabled

        public boolean isSMSDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        Determine whether or not the device's SMS and MMS has been disabled for this user, either by the current admin, if specified, or all admins.
        参数:
        admin - The name of the admin component to check, or null to check if any admins have disabled the SMS and MMS.
        返回:
        true if SMS and MMS has been disabled, otherwise enabled.

      • isVoiceIncomingDisabled

        public boolean isVoiceIncomingDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        Determine whether or not the device's incoming call function has been disabled for this user, either by the current admin, if specified, or all admins.
        参数:
        admin - The name of the admin component to check, or null to check if any admins have disabled the incoming call autosync function
        返回:
        true if incoming call function has been disabled, otherwise false

      • setFingerprintAuthenticationDisabled

        public boolean setFingerprintAuthenticationDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                                    boolean disable)
        Support from EMUI5.1B200 Called by an application that is administering the device to disable the fingerprint authentication function on the device, for this user.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        disable - Whether or not the fingerprint authentication should be disabled.
        返回:
        true if the policy has been set successfully, otherwise false
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_FINGERPRINT} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • isFingerprintAuthenticationDisabled

        public boolean isFingerprintAuthenticationDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        Support from EMUI5.1B200 Determine whether or not the device's fingerprint authentication function has been disabled for this user, either by the current admin, if specified, or all admins.
        参数:
        admin - The name of the admin component to check, or null to check if any admins have disabled the fingerprint authentication
        返回:
        true if fingerprint authentication has been disabled, otherwise false

      • setScheduledPowerOn

        public boolean setScheduledPowerOn(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                   boolean set,
                                   java.lang.String boradcast,
                                   long when)
        Called by an application that is administering the device to set scheduled power on on the device, for this user.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        set - set or cancel the scheduled power on
        boradcast - the boradcast of power on
        when - the time of power on
        返回:
        true if the policy has been set successfully, otherwise false
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_DEVICE_MANAGER} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • setFloatTaskDisabled

        public boolean setFloatTaskDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                    boolean disable)
        Called by an application that is administering the device to disable FloatTask on the device, for this user. After setting this, no applications running as this user will be able to access FloatTask on the device.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        disable - Whether or not the FloatTask should be disabled.
        返回:
        true if the policy has been set successfully, otherwise false
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_DEVICE_MANAGER} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • isFloatTaskDisabled

        public boolean isFloatTaskDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        Determine whether or not the device's FloatTask been disabled for this user, either by the current admin, if specified, or all admins.
        参数:
        admin - The name of the admin component to check, or null to check if any admins have disabled the Wifi.
        返回:
        true if FloatTask has been disabled, otherwise false.

      • setChargeLimit

        public boolean setChargeLimit(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                              java.lang.String limitValue)
        Called by an application that is administering the device to set charge limit value on the device, for this user. After setting this, no applications running as this user will be able to hava a charging limit on the device.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        limitValue - set device just charge under limitValue; set "0" to cancel charge limit; set other value to set specific charge limit value
        返回:
        true if the policy has been set successfully, otherwise false
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_DEVICE_MANAGER} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.
